title: Riccardo Pinosio: personal website
text:
Welcome to my website! I’m Riccardo Pinosio, AI/ML scientist/engineer hybrid extraordinaire (or so I like to think).
I am director of R&D at Knights Analytics. Before that I was a technologist at avanade and data scientist at Funda. I am also a scientific advisor for digi.bio on the application of ML to biological imaging experiments.
I hold a PhD in logic from the ILLC and lecture in machine learning at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences and CMI.
I prefer to work at the intersection of research and engineering because that’s where product innovation that really breaks stuff happens. I’m currently focusing on NLP (information extraction, entity resolution), large-scale knowledge graphs & representation learning, and (neuro)-symbolic AI.
Other than that I love open source, emacs, weird programming languages, and literature (avid Proust fan).

title: Riccardo Pinosio: personal website
text:
Contacts
The best way to get in contact with me is to email me at riccardo@knightsanalytics.com, or to shoot me a DM on linkedin.
